transcript: Jews offering all sorts of tempting wares. The Pavlograds held feast after feast, celebrating awards they had received for the campaign, and made ex- peditions to Olmiitz to visit a certain Caroline the Hungarian, who had recently opened ares- taurant there with girls as waitresses. Rost6v, who had just celebrated his promotion to a cornetcy and bought Denfsov's horse, Bedouin, was in debt all round, to his comrades and the sutlers.
